Dreams.dream: We walked up to the stage. It was so noisy in the room. Over half the seats were empty.
He was leaning against a wall and his eyes were closing and rolling. His hair was longer. I asked him if he drank and did drugs and he said all of them.
We were sitting on a brownstone stoop, laughing. A woman walked out of the house and stood in front of us. She pulled up the bottoms of her tight black pants to show us her thin muscled calves.
